3: Who are you... And why do you know me?
Hey, Watanabe! Long time no see!
Wata... nabe?
We trained together for a while in the beginning and Watanabe was in our group.
Did you forget that too?
It doesn't matter, I'm glad to cut all ties with you Babylonians.
You guys should be glad that it's just me here, if it were my comrades, they'd have cut you into pieces by now.
No need to be so surprised, missy.
If you knew what those people up in Babylonia did to us soldiers of the past...
According to historical records, during the big evacuation, the World Government at that time did abandon some Ground Forces...
These troops cut their connections with Babylonia, and only recently surfaced again as the 'Forsaken'.
And you, Mr. Watanabe, chose to join their forces as a Construct from Babylonia... and was listed as a defected Construct...
You know a lot, little girl... You must be their most advanced Support Construct.
Ugh...
Looks like being able to see you with my own eyes means I didn't let you guys go in vain.
Um...
Stay away from Liv.
Lucia, is this your new commandant?
Watanabe tries to step forward, but Lee raises his gun and points the barrel at Watanabe's head.
You once helped me out, Lucia. Even though it was trivial...
However, I still want to express my gratitude. That way, I won't be in debt to either of you.
Here, it's a gift.
Watanabe takes out a white box and hands it over.
Watanabe insists on handing over the box.
This is a specialty of this desert area, an unnamed wild mint.
Watanabe starts chewing on a mint leaf.
We have it as a snack or to make tea... Sure beats the heat walking in the desert.
Sure smells strong... The commandant looks a bit more awake just by smelling it, hehe.
See what I mean?
